Name: Hallmark All Occasion Cards Assortment—48 Cards and Envelopes with Card Organizer Box (Polka Dots)
Description: Send a note of celebration, sympathy, or encouragement with one of the versatile assorted cards in this boxed set. Covers feature modern designs, accented with embossing, glitter, and metallic foil. Each card contains a unique sentiment inside. Assortment includes 2 each of 24 designs (48 total): 12 birthday cards; 2 thank you cards, congratulations cards, sympathy cards, baby shower cards; 1 thinking of you card, just because card, encouragement card, and blank card. Cards measure 5 7.2nd come with coordinating envelopes and a polka dot storage box with organizational dividers. Printed on high quality paper stock, Hallmark's greeting cards are made with paper from well-managed forests..
